questions.question: What is your full name?
What is your email address?

questions.question: What is the name of the school recommending your STEM OPT?

questions.field_name: Name of School Where STEM Degree Was Earned
questions.question: What is the name of the school where you earned your STEM degree?

questions.field_name: SEVIS School Code of School Recommending STEM OPT (including 3-digit suffix)
questions.question: What is the SEVIS school code of the school recommending your STEM OPT (include the 3-digit suffix)?

questions.field_name: Designated School Official (DSO) Name and Contact Information
questions.question: What is the name and contact information of the Designated School Official (DSO)?
What is your Student SEVIS ID number?
What is the start date of your requested STEM OPT period (mm-dd-yyyy)?
What is the end date of your requested STEM OPT period (mm-dd-yyyy)?

questions.field_name: Qualifying Major and Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) Code
questions.question: What is your qualifying major and its Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) code?
What is the level or type of your qualifying degree?
What is the date your qualifying degree was awarded (mm-dd-yyyy)?
Is this based on a prior degree?
What is your employment authorization number?
What is the name of your employer?
What is the street address of your employer?
What is the suite number of your employer's address?
What is the employer's website URL?
In which city is your employer located?
In which state is your employer located?
What is the ZIP code of your employer?
What is the Employer ID Number (EIN)?

questions.field_name: Number of Full-Time Employees in U.S.
questions.question: How many full-time employees are there in the U.S. for your employer?

questions.field_name: North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code
questions.question: What is the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for your employer?

questions.field_name: OPT Hours Per Week (must be at least 20 hours/week)
questions.question: How many hours per week do you plan to work in your OPT (must be at least 20 hours/week)?

questions.field_name: Compensation: A. Salary Amount and Frequency
questions.question: What is your salary amount and frequency?

questions.field_name: Compensation: B. Other Compensation (Type and Estimated Amount or Value)
questions.question: List other types of compensation you receive, if any, and their estimated amount or value.
What is the start date of your employment (mm-dd-yyyy)?
What is your full name?
What is the name of your employer?
What is the name of the site where you will be working?
What is the address of the site where you will be working (Street, City, State, ZIP)?
What is the name of the official at the site?
What is the title of the official at the site?
What is the email address of the official at the site?
What is the phone number of the official at the site?
Describe your role with the employer and how it is directly related to enhancing the knowledge you obtained through your qualifying STEM degree.

Describe how the assignments with the employer will help you achieve objectives for work-based learning related to your STEM degree. Specify your goals regarding specific knowledge, skills, or techniques as well as the means by which they will be achieved.

Explain how the employer provides oversight and supervision of individuals filling positions such as the one being filled by you. If the employer has a training program or related policy in place that controls such oversight and supervision, please describe it.

Explain how the employer measures and confirms whether individuals filling positions such as the one being filled by you are acquiring new knowledge and skills. If the employer has a training program or related policy in place that controls such measures and assessments, please describe it.
Provide any additional information pertinent to the plan.
Signature of Employer Official with Signatory Authority:
What is the printed name and title of the Employer Official with Signatory Authority?
What is the start date of the evaluation period for the student's self-evaluation?
What is the end date of the evaluation period for the student's self-evaluation?
Signature of the student:
What is the printed name of the student?
What is the date of the student's signature?
Signature of Employer Official with Signatory Authority for progress evaluation:
What is the printed name of the Employer Official with Signatory Authority for progress evaluation?
What is the date of the Employer Official's signature for progress evaluation?
What is the start date of the evaluation period for the final evaluation of the student?
What is the end date of the evaluation period for the final evaluation of the student?
Signature of the student for the final evaluation:
What is the printed name of the student for the final evaluation?
What is the date of the student's signature for the final evaluation?
Signature of Employer Official with Signatory Authority for the final evaluation:
What is the printed name of the Employer Official with Signatory Authority for the final evaluation?
What is the date of the Employer Official's signature for the final evaluation?
